pages.text: Think back to the good old days when you would set little traps for your friends: if they touched the wrong block, they would be completely buried in sand. Now your friends are not so easily fooled.$(br2)Modern problems require modern solutions.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Behaves like a solid block until it receives a $(thing)redstone signal$(). The $(thing)redstone pulse$() propagates through all connected blocks and makes them fall.
